faqs.question: What is the typical size range for a shop for sale in Sector 47
faqs.answer: Commercial shop sizes in Sector 47 generally vary widely depending on the specific project and floor level. Typically you can find smaller units suitable for compact retail starting from around 250 square feet built-up area up to large double-height showrooms exceeding 2000 square feet. Ground floor retail shops tend to be smaller and priced higher per square foot while upper floor units often provide more expansive space at a more competitive entry price. We help you match the size requirements to your specific business plan whether it involves a small boutique or a large anchor store.

faqs.question: What kind of rental yield can I expect from a commercial shop in Sector 47
faqs.answer: The rental yield for a commercial shop for sale in Sector 47 is generally strong and competitive often ranging between 6% to 8% annually depending on factors like the unit’s location within the complex the floor level and the quality of the tenant. Corner units and shops with exceptional visibility or proximity to entry points usually command higher rents and better yields. Given the high demand from established brands and service providers in Sector 47 stable rental income is a key attractive feature of this investment location.

faqs.question: Is Sector 47 considered a high-growth area for commercial investment in Gurgaon
faqs.answer: Absolutely yes Sector 47 is one of Gurgaon’s prime micro-markets for commercial real estate due to its well-established residential base and superior infrastructure. Unlike purely emerging sectors Sector 47 offers stability combined with excellent growth potential driven by surrounding economic activity and planned civic upgrades. Investors typically see strong capital appreciation here over a 5 to 7 year holding period far exceeding returns from less established neighboring areas.

faqs.question: Are there any specific legal documents required when buying a commercial shop
faqs.answer: When purchasing a commercial shop for sale in Sector 47 key documentation includes the Sale Deed or Conveyance Deed the Occupancy Certificate from the relevant authority the Building Plan Approval and the allottee or transfer documents if buying from a previous owner. If the property is newly constructed the RERA registration details are also crucial. Our team ensures comprehensive due diligence verifying all titles and regulatory compliance to guarantee a secure and hassle-free transaction for every buyer.

faqs.question: What are the common maintenance charges for shops in commercial complexes here
faqs.answer: Maintenance charges for commercial shop for sale in complexes in Sector 47 vary widely but typically cover shared amenities such as 24/7 security common area electricity cleaning upkeep of facades and parking facilities. These charges are usually calculated per square foot per month and can range from Rs 15 to Rs 35 per square foot. It is important to factor these operational costs into your overall investment budget to ensure accurate return calculations.

faqs.question: Can foreign nationals or NRIs purchase commercial property in Sector 47
faqs.answer: Yes non-resident Indians NRIs and Persons of Indian Origin PIOs are generally permitted to purchase commercial property including shops in Sector 47 without requiring prior approval from the RBI. However the transaction must comply with FEMA Foreign Exchange Management Act guidelines. Foreign nationals who are not of Indian origin require prior approval from the RBI. We provide specialized legal assistance to ensure smooth compliant transactions for international buyers.

faqs.question: What is the process for securing financing or a loan for a commercial shop purchase
faqs.answer: Securing a loan for a shop for sale in Sector 47 involves submitting documents such as income proof IT returns business continuity proof and property papers to commercial lenders. Banks typically finance 50% to 70% of the commercial property value based on the applicant’s profile and the property’s valuation. Our advisory team assists in connecting you with leading financial institutions offering favorable terms for commercial real estate loans in Gurgaon.
